column1: The Purple Pig////Located in what appears to be an office building
column2: it's surprising to find this very cool restaurant. Delicious cocktails and a good wine list can be found in this upscale modern bistro that's filled with working locals. The food was solid
column3: the artichokes stealing the show. Interesting meats like pork shoulder were tasty and homey
column4: service was attentive. Really enjoyed my late
